Functions
Background
setProperties
loadImageLoad the image file into the background object.
imageLoadedThe function that is called once the image has been loaded.
updateAn update function for the Background object.
setLocationSet the location of the background object.
scrollLeftScroll the background object to the left by the speed amount of the amount of lag from last time the function was called.
scrollRightScroll the background object to the right by the speed amount of the amount of lag from last time the function was called.
scrollDownScroll the background object down by the speed amount of the amount of lag from last time the function was called.
scrollUpScroll the background object up by the speed amount of the amount of lag from last time the function was called.
errorDisplayOutput text to the debugging console
printInfoPrint All the Background info to the debugging console

Load the image file into the background object.

Parameters

Returns

An update function for the Background object.  \

Parameters
